**Secchi Depth, SMHI**  
<!-- Source: [SMHI Shark database](http://www.smhi.se/klimatdata/oceanografi/havsmiljodata/marina-miljoovervakningsdata)   -->
<!-- Downloaded 22 April 2019 by Ellie Campbell   -->
<!-- Data selections:   -->
<!-- Datatype = Physical and Chemical   -->
<!-- Parameter = secchi depth   -->
<!-- Months = All   -->
<!-- Years = 1893-2019 (all listed; though goes back only to 1967 in downloaded dataset)   -->
<!-- Decimal/f채lt-avgr채nsare (decimal/delimiter) = punkt/semikolon (period/semicolon)   -->
<!-- Teckenkodning = UTF-8   -->
<!-- Rubrikrad = Englelska (English)   -->

```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
tab <- t(data.frame(
  c("Datatype:", "Physical and Chemical"), 
  c("Parameter:", "secchi depth"),
  c("Months:", "All"),
  c("Years:", "1893-2019 (all listed; though goes back only to 1967 in downloaded dataset)"),
  c("Decimal/f채lt-avgr채nsare (decimal/delimiter):", "punkt/semikolon (period/semicolon)"),
  c("Teckenkodning:", "UTF-8"),
  c("Rubrikrad:", "Englelska (English)")))

colnames(tab) <- c("Option", "Specification")
rownames(tab) <- NULL

knitr::kable(tab, caption = "Source: [SMHI Shark database](http://www.smhi.se/klimatdata/oceanografi/havsmiljodata/marina-miljoovervakningsdata) <br/> Downloaded 22 April 2019 by Ellie Campbell")
```
